Лучшая игра от Valve после Half-Life.
Жаль, что такие игры больше не делают :(

Portal 2 è da giocare, punto! 

Ovviamente, prima di giocarci assicuratevi di avere un paio di giorni di ferie, perché non riuscirete a smettere finché non arriverete alla fine. 

Gli enigmi sono intricati quanto basta per impegnare senza stancare, e senza dover consultare qualche guida. Riuscirci con le proprie sole forze sarà un premio adeguato allo sforzo, e sarà anche divertente. Non immaginate cosa tutto si può fare con una portal gun. 

Tecnicamente è sopraffino, pur non arrivando alle vette sfarzose di alcuni titoli più blasonati. A differenza del primo Portal, ecco arrivare anche una trama. Certo, è striminzita, ma non ci baderete. La comicità dei cattivi (da GlaDOS a Whitley) è talmente esplosiva e geniale che vi rimarrà nel cuore.
Bellissimo anche il cooperativo. 4 portali invece che 2!

Da giocare assolutamente.
I recomend this game very highly.It is a puzzle game with infinite possibilities.

Потрясающее приключение, которое запомнится навсегда. Игра цепляет и держит сюжетом, головоломками и атмосферой, от самого начала и до самого конца. Истинный шедевр.

Лучшее продолжение одной из лучших головоломок в мире. Честно признаться, после первой части были некие опасения, что сиквел не сможет сравнится с оригиналом. Но в чём то он даже его превзошёл. Глэдос как всегда бесподобна, так к ней ещё присоединился Уитли - развлекают нас на пару всю игру.

Итог: обязательно абсолютно для всех. Умная, красивая, интересная игра с прекрасным чувством юмора
An absolute fun and complex game that envelopes you in an immersive puzzle-solving experience once you start playing it.  Highly recommended to play online with others for added fun!

Portal 2 is so far the best installment of the inevitable portal series. This game features challenging logic puzzles packaged in a first person perspective. The games highlighted feature - the portal gun - was present in both the prequel and this installment. In all, this game is fantastic and well work every penny. 10/10 would play again.
Portal 2 is the most undescibable game i have ever played. The graphics are amazing the gameplay is amazing everything is amazing!!!

I didn't complete this game because of how blatantly anti-femenistic it is; the protagonist is a some sort of mentally challenged woman who is commanded by a male AI. She blindly does everything he says, because apparently Valve thinks women should know their place.

As a woman, this game makes me sick to my stomach; hopefully Valve will learn their lesson before they make any more games!

I have never been much of a puzzle gamer. I tend to prefere RPG or First Person Shooters, but Portal 2 has made me rethink the puzzle genre. Even though the story felt a bit short, this game has provided me with more entertainment than most of those point-and-shoot style games. 
If you are looking for a mental challenge, and witty dialouge than this is the game for you!
